name: ZINARI
description: Zinari(ZINA) is a payments token built to facilitate seamless payments for Small Businesses in developing countries. The token is the native token of Zinari Finance, a blockchain company that uses the blockchain to solve problems for Small Businesses. Zinari can be used as a payments token on the Zinari Payment Gateway/POS terminal or converted to FX which is used for international travel and payment. Staking Pools and Farming options are also available
